item.title: OpenAI partners with Broadcom to design its own AI chips
item.description: OpenAI has announced a collaboration with chipmaker Broadcom to design its own AI computer chips

item.title: California engineer wins pumpkin contest with 2,346-pound gourd
item.description: A California engineer and gardening enthusiast has won the top prize at a pumpkin-weighing contest in Northern California

item.title: The cherished and controversial Miami Seaquarium closes its doors
item.description: The Miami Seaquarium has finally closed its doors

item.title: North Carolina effort wipes out $6.5B in medical debt for 2.5M people
item.description: Officials say a North Carolina government initiative is eliminating over $6.5 billion in medical debt for more than 2.5 million residents

item.title: LendingTree CEO and founder Doug Lebda dies in ATV accident
item.description: LendingTree CEO and founder Doug Lebda died in an ATV accident on Sunday, the company confirmed
